abstract: Shares turned around in afternoon trading, though one analyst characterized the markets as searching for direction.
snippet: Shares turned around in afternoon trading, though one analyst characterized the markets as searching for direction.
lead_paragraph: Stocks closed a lightly traded session higher Tuesday despite disappointing earnings from Goldman Sachs and Johnson & Johnson.

headline.main: Wall Street Ends the Day Higher
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Struggles to End Higher in a Light Day of Trading
